title: Looking for any rank top and adc.
body:
Hey all,
Got a good gig going a the moment. Le Good Guys are looking for a capable adc or top laner!
any rank is fine. the ranks that are currently in the team and ready to play are from bronze, silver and diamond.

requirements are that you're able to use Curse Voice. that would be best!
thanks everyone.
squats

Sorry forgot to mention this is for RANKED 5's

replies.body:
ill be happy to play, im brionze but what to improve and all that. i adc or jg but you already have a jg :)
IGN is PatrickkStar
Im a gold 1 feeding scrub lord, who plays top

Dia+ skill ADC, Mid, Support.

are u toxic because im real good at Ekko but get titled real easy with toxic players.
